此遊戲紀錄僅列出各遊戲的當日總和，若您需要查詢各遊戲的詳細記錄，請於各遊戲中的遊: This game record only lists the daily total of each game. If you need to check the detailed records of each game, please check the game records in each game.
各平台遊戲紀錄查詢方式和路徑不盡相同，此處無法一一列舉說明，請各位玩家見諒。: The query methods and paths of game records on different platforms are different, and it is impossible to list them all here. Please forgive me.
各遊戲統計遊戲紀錄之時間有可能不盡相同，可能無法進行即時核對，發現金額計算有所差: The time of each game's statistics and game records may be different, and it may not be possible to check in real time. If you find that the calculation of the amount is different, you can try again later
※遊戲紀錄統計時間從1分鐘~隔日統計都是有可能的。: The game record statistics time is possible from 1 minute to the next day
遊戲記錄統計由於每間廠商同步資訊時間可能稍有不同，若有發現即時記錄不同，請稍後重: Game record statistics may be slightly different due to the time when each manufacturer synchronizes information. If you find that the real-time records are different, please check again later.
